value:
This ninja garb is quite charming.
Useful if I need to have my target
wrapped around my finger...

I've always wanted to learn about the
ninja of Hoshido. How lucky that this
festival's drawn them into the light.

I'm well aware of how essential it is to
gather reliable intelligence. One false
lead can have dire consequences.

As Corrin and Elise said, this festival
is full of surprises. It's quite a thrill to
experience so many new things.

"So long as it is in service to Corrin,
I shall do whatever is asked of me."
There—was that ninja enough?

Camilla the ninja, at your service.
I have a little gift for you, from your
friend $Nf.

Ninja are always ready to risk their
lives for the ones they care about.
That is their greatest strength, I think.

If those eyes of yours wander much
longer, I might begin to suspect that
you've let your guard down.

So sorry—I know I have a tendency to
stand out in a crowd. I'll do my best
to be discreet in the future.

Charm isn't the only means I have to
gather information. I'll prove it to you.

I am Camilla, princess of Nohr. I'll be
playing the part of ninja today, so if
you need to find me...good luck.

A ninja will fearlessly take on any
mission, even a life-threatening
one, in service to a lord.$k$pPartaking in this festival has given me
a great appreciation for the strength
and resolve of ninja.$k$pEspecially because that strength most
often comes from a desire to protect
those who are important to them.$k$pI can, of course, relate to that a great
deal from my personal experience.$k$pAs a princess, I rely on those who
support me from the shadows. It's
refreshing to see the other side of it.$k$pThank you for giving me this learning
opportunity. It's not one I'll soon
forget, $Nu.
Your life is mine!
Accept defeat.
I will see this through.
No hard feelings, dear.
They found me...
A festival to honor the ninja of Hoshido? How fascinating.
*gasp* I let you catch me by surprise? How unbecoming of a ninja.
Gathering intelligence is more difficult than I thought. My retainers deserve more praise!
None of this is easy for me, you know. I do tend to stand out.
I could tell you all my secrets, but then I'd have to... Well, you know.
Corrin and Elise make utterly adorable ninja.
What will it be today? Infiltration? Assassination? I'm ready for anything.
Ready, sweetie.
Orders?
Stealthy as can be.
